texts: Crossrail Limited (Crossrail) is the company responsible for creating Crossrail, which is a project to build major new railway connections under central London. Crossrail is a wholly owned subsidiary of Transport for London and is subject to the requirements of the Freedom of Information Act.
To find out what information Crossrail makes available, please select a category from below
